channel.title: David Southwell / @cultauthor
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @cultauthor. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: R to @GregMichaelson1: Yes I did, Mr. Annoyed on the Net and Missing the Point. Mind you, I have a 42 years of respect for Le Guin and close to none for you, so getting her name right is a lot more important to me than being grammatical and fully comprehensible to you.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: Yes I did, Mr. Annoyed on the Net and Missing the Point. Mind you, I have a 42 years of respect for Le Guin and close to none for you, so getting her name right is a lot more important to me than being grammatical and fully comprehensible to you.

item.title: R to @tforcworc: Possibly one of the best YA - before the genre was labelled - of all time.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: Possibly one of the best YA - before the genre was labelled - of all time.

item.title: R to @tforcworc: All Gibson is good, but some of it - especially the early materials - seems at times far too hopeful.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: All Gibson is good, but some of it - especially the early materials - seems at times far too hopeful.

item.title:
Unwritten books I want to read:
All The Lies We Tell About The Pink Light Awkward Teenage Car Journeys Dirty Little Satellites I Give You My Hand In Wickedness The Suffrage of Georgia Diss Adventures in Synthetic Courage Pick Your Donkey Go Tell Garry Bag SE4 Thinks He’s A Knob
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description:
Unwritten books I want to read:

All The Lies We Tell About The Pink Light
Awkward Teenage Car Journeys
Dirty Little Satellites
I Give You My Hand In Wickedness
The Suffrage of Georgia Diss
Adventures in Synthetic Courage
Pick Your Donkey
Go Tell Garry Bag SE4 Thinks He’s A Knob

item.title: R to @GregMichaelson1: Also, maybe next time try to honour her and her ideas and worlds by actually having the respect to spell her name correctly.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: Also, maybe next time try to honour her and her ideas and worlds by actually having the respect to spell her name correctly.

item.title: R to @GregMichaelson1: I think you are missing the point and possibly some crucial recent news that we are moving backwards to a future of increasingly rubbish future or gender roles. Le Guin seems hopelessly hopeful at this point.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: I think you are missing the point and possibly some crucial recent news that we are moving backwards to a future of increasingly rubbish future or gender roles. Le Guin seems hopelessly hopeful at this point.

item.title: When an account you have followed for years begins to feel like porcine rolling around in disaster porn, misplaced loyalty becomes toxic. Sometimes we have be brave enough to leave others to their wallowing, their apocalyptic amplification and jonesing for drama.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: When an account you have followed for years begins to feel like porcine rolling around in disaster porn, misplaced loyalty becomes toxic. Sometimes we have be brave enough to leave others to their wallowing, their apocalyptic amplification and jonesing for drama.

item.title: R to @PeterReavill: He is. Reduced usually to Triffids, Cuckoos and Kraken - which are all outstanding books of the English apocalypse where much of the horror is humanity’s response to the alien - he is a master of the short story and one of best handlers of casual world-building you can read.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: He is. Reduced usually to Triffids, Cuckoos and Kraken - which are all outstanding books of the English apocalypse where much of the horror is humanity’s response to the alien - he is a master of the short story and one of best handlers of casual world-building you can read.

item.title: RT by @cultauthor: Days after it has stopped dancing and demanding drink in almost all of Hookland, the Bone Horse still clip-clops the streets of Mether. Some say it is because it has extra work to do due to number of ghosts in the village. Others that it has an exceptional thirst for roasted ale.
item.dc:creator: @HooklandGuide
item.description: Days after it has stopped dancing and demanding drink in almost all of Hookland, the Bone Horse still clip-clops the streets of Mether. Some say it is because it has extra work to do due to number of ghosts in the village. Others that it has an exceptional thirst for roasted ale.

item.title: R to @bob_threemthree: Agreed.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: Agreed.

item.title: RT by @cultauthor: All the way to the collapsing edge, old walls mark even more ancient borders. Local lore has it that the stones whisper among themselves about those that have crossed them. I need no other reason to learn the language of rocks. – Katherine Giddings, 1949
item.dc:creator: @HooklandGuide
item.description: All the way to the collapsing edge, old walls mark even more ancient borders. Local lore has it that the stones whisper among themselves about those that have crossed them. I need no other reason to learn the language of rocks. – Katherine Giddings, 1949

item.title: R to @Afterpants1: Except it didn’t.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: Except it didn’t.

item.title: R to @Afterpants1: It never ever was a book about the future.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: It never ever was a book about the future.

item.title: RT by @cultauthor: For much of history, witches often endured being half-exiles from their communities. Too feared and suspected to be favoured as a neighbour. Too useful to be entirely shunned. Even to society, we were hedge-riders and creatures of threshold – #EmilyBanting, 1981 #WitchWednesday
item.dc:creator: @HooklandGuide
item.description: For much of history, witches often endured being half-exiles from their communities. Too feared and suspected to be favoured as a neighbour. Too useful to be entirely shunned. Even to society, we were hedge-riders and creatures of threshold – #EmilyBanting, 1981 #WitchWednesday

item.title: R to @Afterpants1: It has been 1984 since 1948.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: It has been 1984 since 1948.

item.title: RT by @cultauthor: I confess Arthur, many of my navigations are by beer balefire. Yet in Ashcourt, I have a sense that it is not only the living travellers who use taverns' large ale lights for reckoning. They seem to act as ghost compass for many spirits. – #CLNolan in letter to #ArthurMachen
item.dc:creator: @HooklandGuide
item.description: I confess Arthur, many of my navigations are by beer balefire. Yet in Ashcourt, I have a sense that it is not only the living travellers who use taverns' large ale lights for reckoning. They seem to act as ghost compass for many spirits. – #CLNolan in letter to #ArthurMachen

item.title: RT by @cultauthor: Th witch knows the magic of the five directions, all the land's news walks towards her. The witch knows the spirits of the crossroads. All the confused dead unable to find their way home whisper to her in exchange for directions. – #EmilyBanting, 1981 #WithWednesday
item.dc:creator: @HooklandGuide
item.description: Th witch knows the magic of the five directions, all the land's news walks towards her. The witch knows the spirits of the crossroads. All the confused dead unable to find their way home whisper to her in exchange for directions. – #EmilyBanting, 1981 #WithWednesday

item.title: RT by @cultauthor: I have prayed in feral churches to half-forgotten saints. Walked near-lost paths in the company of old gods. I've encountered wonders and enchantments that made me promise silence. Yet in all this, I've seen no magic more powerful than a parent's love for its child. – #CLNolan
item.dc:creator: @HooklandGuide
item.description: I have prayed in feral churches to half-forgotten saints. Walked near-lost paths in the company of old gods. I've encountered wonders and enchantments that made me promise silence. Yet in all this, I've seen no magic more powerful than a parent's love for its child. – #CLNolan

item.title: R to @JaneClifford23: Jagged Orbit which predicts the Internet in 1970 and more of less plot of Terminator.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: Jagged Orbit which predicts the Internet in 1970 and more of less plot of Terminator.

item.title: R to @wayswithweirds: It was editing. Heavy editing.
item.dc:creator: @cultauthor
item.description: It was editing. Heavy editing.
